bibl.title: Roads in the Deserts of Roman Egypt. Analysis, atlas, commentary
bibl.seg: Maciej Paprocki, Roads in the Deserts of Roman Egypt. Analysis, atlas, commentary.
Oxford - Philadelphia, Oxbow, 2019, x-341 pp., figg. ISBN 978-1-78925-156-2. £38.

1. Introduction: research aims, book structure, and sources. - 2. Road networks of Roman Egypt. - 3. Pack animals in ancient Egyptian desert transport: shifting patterns of use. - 4. Roads of the Sinai Peninsula. - 5. Roads of the Eastern Desert. - 6. Roads of the Western Desert. - 7. Road density area studies. - 8. Conclusions and future research. - Bibliography. Indexes.
